amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide for the prevention of the transmission of foodborne illness or to meet preventive-control requirements for food safety.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cicilline amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 190 - 232 (Roll no. 38).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Cicilline amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 190 - 232 (Roll no. 38).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Cicilline.
